entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:40 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:47 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:47 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming west 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 01:47 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
